message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  How about $8,500? I'm genuinely interested in this product, and I believe this price is fair for both of us.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This is my final offer.
